ModMetaData.name: LMC077.高速公路修复计划
ModMetaData.author: Mic, Owlchemist
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Ever found the ancient highways to be...disappointing? Well, now you can rebuild them to their former glory with some new things. Rebuild the lights, the barriers, and most importantly - repave the roads with fresh, clean asphalt that gives a slight speed boost over the base roads. 有没有发现古代高速公路……令人失望？ 好吧，现在你可以用一些新的东西重建它们，恢复它们以前的荣光吧！ 重建灯光、路障，最重要的是用崭新的沥青重新铺设道路，在新的道路上稍微加快移动速度。 Original mod by Mic but has not been updated since b17. All credit to the original author, I just made a sweep through the XMLs to update it for v1.0. Owlchemist将其升级到了1.0版本适用，原作者Mic。
